review: Excellent no problems at all Highly recommend. I wish it was a little bit faster though, but I am pretty sure thats just technology and my internet speed. I did notice the metal tip got bent a few times when i tripped over my cord however i think thats just the plastic housing around it because i quickly bent it back in place no problem and still haven't had any issues since. I would recommend this device for sure. And screen casting is awesome! It also looks nice too and not cheap at all. I do wish it came with an option for a smaller cord though. because the micro cable it comes with is huge and is the reason why i tripped over it several times. you can buy a perfectly designed one using this link. http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00NDOIZ2K/ref=wl_it_dp_o_pC_nS_ttl?_encoding=UTF8&colid;=2KL4HP8WFUEZD&coliid;=IZKOLROAQD5Y3
